title: Land for sale in Ella - Badulla
details:
Very beautiful, peaceful, calm and quiet surrounding land

125 Perches land in Ella
200 meter to main road
15 -20 wide road access

Water and Electricity available
Clear deed

Cool climate throughout the year, with scenic view and a quiet make this an ideal location to build a good guest house or Hotel.

Price Rs 2 M Per Perch

Please call for more information
